IOpipe | Full Time | Philadelphia, NYC, or remote | Frontend/Fullstack Engineer

IOpipe is a solution to automate and simplify the development and operations of serverless applications. Our users are able to optimize their applications, simplify debugging of distributed and event-driven applications, and even generate complex, distributed applications automatically.

Our founders hail from the Docke and OpenStack projects with backgrounds in systems, networking, and security.

As our first frontend engineer, you will have a critical role in choosing tools and technologies while building customer-facing IOpipe services.

Contact us, and lets talk! <eric@iopipe.com>
